dmca.title: Case ID 17909059 - Notice of Claimed Infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


-----Original Message-----
From: DMCA [mailto:DMCA@theEsa.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, December 21, 2005 9:04 PM
To: George Poletes
Subject: Case ID 17909059 - Notice of Claimed Infringement

?December 21, 2005

Entertainment Software Association
Attention:  Piracy Enforcement Officer
575 7th Street, NW, Suite 300
Washington, DC 20004 USA

Telephone:  202-223-2400
Fax:  202-223-2401
E-mail:  dmca@theESA.com

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX  75207  US


Dear George Poletes:

The Entertainment Software Association (
